abilities.name: Mega Hook
abilities.description: Captures the strongest Bloon on screen (including BADs), guaranteeing its death. Max 2 uses per round.

abilities.name: Rapid Hooks
abilities.description: Uses up to 10 hooks in quick succession, which work on up to ZOMGs. MOABs, BFBs, and DDTs use 1 hook while ZOMGs use 2.

attacks.name: Plasma Turrets
attacks.special: There are 3 turrets on each side of the ship. Both sides can fire at the same time.

attacks.name: Cannonballs
attacks.special: There are 3 cannons on each side of the ship. Both sides can fire at the same time.

support.name: Trade Empire Buff
support.description: All Merchantman and Favored Trades Buccaneers on screen earn extra money based on how many of them there are. +$10 for each Merchantman and +$20 for each Favored Trades. They also get a bonus +10 base damage, +10 bonus damage to Blimps, and +10 bonus damage to Ceramics.

support.name: Sellback Buff
support.description: Towers in range sell for 10% more of their original cost. (80% instead of 70%)

support.name: Carrier Flagship Buff
support.description: All water-based towers and Monkey Aces on screen get 85% attack rate (+17.65% attack speed). This includes Goliath Doomship.
